content: classic c2c blanket materials yarn any yarn will work i used medium/dk weight for my example blanket crochet hook any hook will work i used a i hook for my example blanket 5 5 mm scissors stitch markers crochet stitches needed chain chain stitch st skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here double_crochet stitch double_crochet video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here classic c2c blanket pattern row 1 make 6 chs 1 double_crochet into the 4th chain from your hook 1 double_crochet into each of the next 2 chs so you ll have 3 double_crochet made and some chs to the right row 2/increase row make 6 chs 1 double_crochet into the 4th chain from your hook 1 double_crochet into each of the next 2 chs flip your original block from row 1 where the chs are facing left slip_stitch into the chs from the original block of 3 double_crochet + chs chain 3 make 3 double_crochet into chain space you just sl st d into repeat this row 2/increase row for how wide you want your blanket row 3/decrease row chain 3 slip_stitch into the chain space of the block you just made *make 3 double_crochet into the chain space you just slip_stitch d into slip_stitch into the chain space of the next block repeat the steps above from * until you reach the last block of this row slip_stitch into the chain space of the last block in this row to complete repeat this row 3/decrease row until your blanket is complete ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ i have this free pattern on my blog here video tutorial for this afghan here step by step photo tutorial for this afghan here playlist featuring more free blanket tutorials here follow crochet me lovely on all social media @crochetmelovely if you want to learn new stitches and techniques subscribe to my youtube channel here find more patterns on my blog here if you have any questions about this pattern email me at crochetmelovely@yahoo com thank you for downloading this pattern enjoy
